sections.heading: other than for the recovery of real property
sections.text: Civil actions, other than for the recovery of real property, can only be brought within the following periods, after the cause of action shall have accrued.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 9, p. 395;R.S.1913, § 7566;C.S.1922, § 8509;C.S.1929, § 20-204;R.S.1943, § 2
